ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] newbie question(s)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can sing from level 1. It requires you to buy the songs from a song vendor. At level 3 you have two songs which is really usefull: 1. area effect (AoE)
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Hi, nice to see this group here! I just got the EQ Trilogy and
> installed everything, seems to run ok. I now have a level 3 Bard
> with whom I've been practicing singing. He is now up to "Feeble"
> does this mean i can start singing? Do I need to learn songs? How
> do i do that?
>
You can sing from level 1. It requires you to buy the songs from a song
vendor.
At level 3 you have two songs which is really usefull:
1. area effect (AoE) dot
2. battle buff (Chant of battle)

Be carefull about the AOE dot getting close to guards with it running is not
a thing to do.
You should also learn about "twisting" which enables you to sing 2 or 3
songs at the same time.
It requires some practice to get down, but once learned your group members
will bow in awe for you :)

> Also, is the game supposed to run in full screen? I have it on
> 800x600 and it doesnt fill the screen. And at higher resolutions the
> game screen gets smaller. Mind I have tweaked voodoo3 drivers
> running in XP so i can use Glide with other games so that could be
> the culpret.

Hit F10 and see what happens ;o)

Musiker Silverdrum, almost retired minstrel on Bertox
Musiker Danesang, Skald on Lancelot
